abstract: Profit at HSBC, the European bank, rose 10 percent last year, just below analysts’ forecasts, as strong gains in Asia helped it absorb a $17.2 billion hit for bad debts related largely to housing problems in the United States.
lead_paragraph: Profit at HSBC, the European bank, rose 10 percent last year, just below analysts’ forecasts, as strong gains in Asia helped it absorb a $17.2 billion hit for bad debts related largely to housing problems in the United States.
